channel.title: IS 301 on UAH Notes
channel.description: Recent content in IS 301 on UAH Notes

item.description:
• Increasing threat of AI to scams/phising,etc
  • Deepfakes
  • Scripts
  • Needs to be figured out in the coming years
  • AI is becoming something that “feeds itself”
    • Content generated by AI is also making its way to the internet-creating an infinite cycle
      • What consequences would it have
        • Will we hit a plateau in AI development soon?
  • Decreasing amount of third-party malware protection tools- inbuilt tools are considered good enough for most now adays
  • Increasing concerns about personal devices and their ability to spy/report back data
  • Smart Speaks
  • Cameras
  • Warranty-voided devices
  • Increasing availability of passkeys
  • Major companies are increasingly adopting passkeys

• Netflix: Data, Algorithms & Personalization — The Invisible Engine

    How Netflix Sustains Leadership in the Shift from Atoms to Bits

    Presented by: TEAM 2

    Course: IS 301 – Information Systems in Organizations

    Why Personalization

    Matters

    80%+ of viewing comes
    from personalized
    recommendations

    Each member sees a
    unique homepage
    Reduces choice
    overload and increases
    satisfaction

    Personalization
    improves engagement
    and reduces churn

    Core driver of Netflix’s
    competitive position

    Artwork & Experience Personalization

    • Personalized thumbnails for each user
